attributes.action: Please support the Errection of a statue of Screaming Lord Sutch in Harrow.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please support the errection of a Statue of Screaming Lord Sutch, the founder and late,former leader of The Official Monster Raving Loony Party, in Harrow.It's high time that a permanant memorial to the great man was put up.
